mapper.select: SELECT lod_img_url, lod_name, x, y, lod_address, seller_notice, reservation_notice, avg_rating FROM LODGMENT L WHERE lod_idx = #{lod_idx};

SELECT r.room_idx, r.lod_idx, r.room_name, r.room_notice, r.room_price, r.max_people_cnt, r.max_pet_cnt, r.avg_rating, r.number_of_review, r.created, r.updated, r.status, p.ROOM_PHOTO_URL FROM ROOM r LEFT JOIN PHOTO p ON r.room_idx = p.room_idx AND r.lod_idx = p.lod_idx WHERE r.lod_idx = #{lod_idx}

SELECT SELLER.SELLER_IDX, SELLER.SELLER_ID, SELLER.SELLER_PWD, SELLER.SELLER_NAME, SELLER.SELLER_NICK_NAME, SELLER.SELLER_EMAIL, SELLER.SELLER_PHONE_NUMBER FROM SELLER JOIN LODGMENT ON SELLER.SELLER_IDX = LODGMENT.LOD_IDX WHERE LODGMENT.LOD_IDX = 3 AND SELLER.SELLER_NICK_NAME = '지현';

SELECT R.room_idx, R.lod_idx, R.room_name, R.room_price, R.room_img_url, R.max_people_cnt, R.max_pet_cnt FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN RESERVATION RES ON R.room_idx = RES.room_idx AND( (#{checkinDate} >= RES.res_str_date AND RES.res_end_date > #{checkinDate}) OR (#{checkoutDate} > RES.res_str_date AND RES.res_end_date >= #{checkoutDate}) ) WHERE R.lod_idx = #{lod_idx} AND RES.room_idx IS NULL -- 예약이 없는 객실만 선택 AND R.max_people_cnt >= #{guestCount} AND R.max_pet_cnt >= #{petCount} ORDER BY R.room_price ASC;
